channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- uws node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- uws node module

item.title: CVE-2016-10544|2024-08-06T03:21:52.282Z -- hackerone -- uws%20node%20module
item.description: uws is a WebSocket server library. By sending a 256mb websocket message to a uws server instance with permessage-deflate enabled, there is a possibility used compression will shrink said 256mb down to less than 16mb of websocket payload which passes the length check of 16mb payload. This data will then inflate up to 256mb and crash the node process by exceeding V8's maximum string size. This affects uws >=0.10.0 <=0.10.8.
